snippet.title: Play Dead! Voice Trailer - Horror/Comedy Visual Novel
snippet.description:
Hey! Did you know I have ANOTHER visual novel series besides DreamCatcher? It's called Play Dead! and it's a Scooby-Doo-esque story about a touring pop punk band that accidentally adopts a ghost dog, and suddenly can't seem to stop getting into supernatural shenanigans on the road. It's fully voice-acted, totally FREE(!) and you can get the first two chapters now!

Chapter 1: https://hazumirein.itch.io/play-dead

Chapter 2: https://hazumirein.itch.io/play-dead-2

Want to follow me for updates on my projects? Check out the Skelebun Studios Twitter here: https://twitter.com/SkelebunStudios

Music: 
The Pumpkin Head by Frank Schröter
Link: https://filmmusic.io/song/6663-the-pumpkin-head
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
